text: at Canton space we're building software
tools that are making space flights
safer for satellite operators we allow
satellite operators to put collision
avoidance on autopilot if they have a
high risk event we provide them with an
automatic and autonomous satellite
collision avoidance recommendation on a
good day everybody expects it to work
right but the problem is that the
service should be available on the worst
day possible unless you have access to
almost unlimited resources it is
impossible to guarantee service that's
why we just chose to build our service
on AWS so we can expand and we can scale
up whenever our customers need that most
being on AWS allows us to guarantee
availability to our customers it makes
it a lot easier for us to deploy
Services quickly to test them to
brainstorm and you have almost unlimited
access to any resource that you need
globally and and that's just unheard of
most of our software runs on Amazon eks
we use Amazon RDS for our databases
Amazon S3 for storage and Amazon sqs for
our messaging and for our keys
